attributes.action: direct the Foreign Office to assist IRA victims to obtain compensation from the USA in the same way as support has been promised for those seeking compensation from Libya.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Throughout the troubles in Northern Ireland weapons and cash flooded into the IRA from many sources. Amongst these Libya provided ammunition and US citizens provided cash and weaponry. During this time, the US government did nothing. It was only after 9/11 that they moved to prevent this illegal action.

This was state sponsored terrorism and victims should be compensated accordingly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
